## confirm-dialog package

A library for rendering a confirmation dialog that forces the user to take action

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ConfirmDialogModule](./confirm-dialog.confirmdialogmodule.md) | Responsible for declaring the neccesary components. |
|  [ConfirmDialogService](./confirm-dialog.confirmdialogservice.md) | Responsible for rendering a confirmation dialog on request |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ConfirmDialogConfig](./confirm-dialog.confirmdialogconfig.md) | Represents a configuration object for a confirmation dialog |
